member.name: T:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IHTMLEventCallBack
member.summary: Simple interface used as a callback implemented by the main control GUID generated using PSDK GUID generator

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IUrlHistoryStg.BindToObject(System.String,System.Guid@,System.Object)
member.summary: Currently not implemented

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IShellLinkA.GetPath(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Int32,WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.WIN32_FIND_DATAA@,WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.SLGP_FLAGS)
member.summary: Retrieves the path and file name of a Shell link object

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IShellLinkA.GetIDList(System.IntPtr@)
member.summary: Retrieves the list of item identifiers for a Shell link object

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IShellLinkA.SetIDList(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Sets the pointer to an item identifier list (PIDL) for a Shell link object

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IShellLinkA.GetDescription(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the description string for a Shell link object

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IShellLinkA.SetDescription(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the description for a Shell link object. The description can be any application-defined string

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IShellLinkA.GetWorkingDirectory(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the name of the working directory for a Shell link object

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IShellLinkA.SetWorkingDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the name of the working directory for a Shell link object

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IShellLinkA.GetArguments(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the command-line arguments associated with a Shell link object

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IShellLinkA.SetArguments(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the command-line arguments for a Shell link object

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IShellLinkA.GetHotkey(System.Int16@)
member.summary: Retrieves the hot key for a Shell link object

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IShellLinkA.SetHotkey(System.Int16)
member.summary: Sets a hot key for a Shell link object

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IShellLinkA.GetShowCmd(System.Int32@)
member.summary: Retrieves the show command for a Shell link object

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IShellLinkA.SetShowCmd(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the show command for a Shell link object. The show command sets the initial show state of the window.

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IShellLinkA.GetIconLocation(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Retrieves the location (path and index) of the icon for a Shell link object

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IShellLinkA.SetIconLocation(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the location (path and index) of the icon for a Shell link object

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IShellLinkA.SetRelativePath(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the relative path to the Shell link object

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IShellLinkA.Resolve(System.IntPtr,WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.SLR_FLAGS)
member.summary: Attempts to find the target of a Shell link, even if it has been moved or renamed

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IShellLinkA.SetPath(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the path and file name of a Shell link object

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.ProcessWeb.InternalCreateWB
member.summary: Create Webbrowser control and set up it's events called from OnHandleCreated Webbrowser control hosting requires an HWND

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.ProcessWeb.DrawThumb2(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat)
member.summary: Faster than DrawThumb, but does not work if a window is hidden or is not on top of the zorder

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.ProcessWeb.InvokeScript(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Invokes a script within the HTML page

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.ProcessWeb.AutomationTask_PerformClickButton(System.String)
member.summary: Performs a click on a Button element with given name

member.name: T:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.ProcessWeb.AutomationTasks
member.summary: Call this only once, as other calls are ignored by library. Allow or disallow HTML dialogs launched using showModelessDialog() and showModalDialog() methods using CBT Window Hook. Default, allow = true

member.name: F:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.STATURL.pwcsUrl
member.summary: The specified URL.The calling function must free this parameter. Set this parameter to STATURL_QUERYFLAG_NOURL if no URL is specified.

member.name: F:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.STATURL.pwcsTitle
member.summary: The title of the Web page, as contained in the title tags. This calling application must free this parameter. Set this parameter to STATURL_QUERYFLAG_NOTITLE if no Web page is specified.

member.name: T:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.HTMLEventHandler
member.summary: HTMLEventHandler delegate
member.param: Instance of cHTMLWindowEvents or cHTMLDocumentEvents class

member.name: T:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.HTMLEventArgs
member.summary: html document and window event argument class

member.name: T:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.cHTMLWindowEvents
member.summary: To handle Window events

member.name: T:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.cHTMLDocumentEvents
member.summary: To handle Document events

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.CaptureWebpage(System.String)
member.summary: Capture web page from url or local path.
member.param: Website page url or HTML/MHTML file path.
member.returns: WebsitesScreenshot.Result, result of the capturing process (Captured, Failed, Timeout).

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.CaptureWebpageAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronize method to capture web page from url or local path. Return value can be handled in CaptureResult event.
member.param: Website page url or HTML/MHTML file path.

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.CaptureHTML(System.String)
member.summary: Capture HTML code and convert it to image.
member.returns: WebsitesScreenshot.Result, result of the capturing process (Captured, Failed, Timeout).

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.CaptureHTMLAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronize method to capture HTML code and convert it to image. Return value can be handled in CaptureResult event.

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.SaveImage(System.String)
member.summary: Save captured image.
member.param: Output image name with full path.

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.GetImage
member.summary: Get captured image in memory.

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.GetDocumentTitle
member.summary: Get the title of the captured web page.

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.GetDocumentText
member.summary: Get the text content of the captured web page.

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.GetDocumentLinks
member.summary: Get the URLs of links on the captured web page.

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.GetDocumentFrames
member.summary: Get the URLs of frames on the captured web page.

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.GetDocumentImages
member.summary: Get the URLs of images on the captured web page.

member.summary: Get HTML Source of the captured web page.

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.GetHtmlDocument
member.summary: Get the HTML Document object of the captured web page.

member.name: P:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.ImageFormat
member.summary: Output image format, default value JPG.

member.name: P:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.JpegQuality
member.summary: Output JPEG image quality percent, value from 0 to 100, default value 100.

member.name: P:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.ImageWidth
member.summary: Width of the output image, default width automatically determined.

member.name: P:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.ImageHeight
member.summary: Height of the output image, default height automatically determined.

member.name: P:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.PreserveAspectRatio
member.summary: Preserve aspect ratio when applying width or height to the output.

member.name: P:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.BrowserWidth
member.summary: Browser width, default width automatically determined.

member.name: P:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.BrowserHeight
member.summary: Browser height, default height automatically determined.

member.name: P:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.NoActiveX
member.summary: Disable ActiveX on the page.

member.name: P:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.NoJava
member.summary: Disable Java on the page.

member.name: P:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.NoScripts
member.summary: Disable Scripts on the page.

member.name: P:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.TimeOutSeconds
member.summary: Timeout in seconds. Timeout value for the process, default value 120 seconds.

member.name: P:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.DelaySeconds
member.summary: Delay in seconds. After page loads, take screenshot after specified seconds, default value 1 second.

member.name: P:WebsitesScreenshot.WebsitesScreenshot.Force
member.summary: Force to take screenshot if timeout.

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.WinApis.DeleteFromUrlCache(System.String)
member.summary: Attempts to delete a cookie or cache entry

member.name: T:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.LoadHTMLMoniker
member.summary: For loading html into document while having the ability to set the baseUrl Only two methods of IMoniker are called BindToStorage and GetDisplayName In BindToStorage, we pass a ref to our stream object to be used for loading page data. In GetDisplayName, we pass our baseUrl to MSHTML to be used.

member.name: T:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.HTMLDispIDs
member.summary: Dispids taken from MsHtmdid.h

member.name: T:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.cHTMLParser
member.summary: Using MSHTML as a UI-less HTML parser

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.cHTMLParser.StartParsing(System.String)
member.summary: Only public method which starts the parsing process When parsing is done, we receive a DISPID_READYSTATE dispid in IPropertyNotifySink.OnChanged implementation

member.name: E:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.cHTMLParser.HtmlParsingDoneEvent
member.summary: The only event fired by this class upon completion of parsing

member.name: P:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.cHTMLParser.U_ID
member.summary: Unique ID for this instance

member.name: P:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.cHTMLParser.OriginalURL
member.summary: Original URL used for parsing

member.name: P:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.cHTMLParser.ParserDocument
member.summary: Accessor for our document

member.summary: Used by Deserialize method for setting properties of TreeNode from xml node attributes

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.HTMLEditHelper.FindParent(WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IHTMLElement,System.String)
member.summary: Searches for a parent (or grandparent) element with the given tag ParentTagName must be in the form "TD" "TR" "TABLE" (uppercase)

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.HTMLEditHelper.NextSibiling(WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IHTMLDOMNode)
member.summary: Returns the right neighbour which is a IHTMLElement in the HTML hierarchy

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.HTMLEditHelper.PreviousSibling(WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IHTMLDOMNode)
member.summary: Returns the left neighbour which is a IHTMLElement in the HTML hierarchy

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.HTMLEditHelper.RemoveNode(WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IHTMLElement,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes node element If RemoveAllChildren == true, Removes this element and all it's children from the document else it just strips this element but does not remove its children E.g. "Hello World" ---> strip BIG tag --> "Hello World"

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.HTMLEditHelper.IsElementEmpty(WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IHTMLElement)
member.summary: Return TRUE if the element is empty inside (e.g. )

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.HTMLEditHelper.AddToSelection(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 1) If nothing is selected returns false 2) If the user has selected text or multiple elements inserts s_BeginHtml before and s_EndHtml behind the current selection 3)If the user has selected a control returns false

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.HTMLEditHelper.PasteIntoSelection(System.String)
member.summary: The currently selected text/controls will be replaced by the given HTML code. If nothing is selected, the HTML code is inserted at the cursor position

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.HTMLEditHelper.InsertHTML(WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IHTMLElement,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Inserts the given HTML code inside or outside of this Html element There are 4 possible insert positions: Outside-BeforeInside-Before InnerHTML Inside-AfterOuside-After

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.HTMLEditHelper.AppendChild(System.String)
member.summary: Creates and appends an HTMLElement to the end of the document DOM

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.HTMLEditHelper.AppendChild(WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IHTMLElement,System.String)
member.summary: Creates and appends an HTMLElement to a parent element

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.HTMLEditHelper.GetParentRow(WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IHTMLElement)
member.summary: Returns parent row of passed cell element

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.HTMLEditHelper.GetParentTable(WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IHTMLElement)
member.summary: Returns parent table of passed cell element

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.HTMLEditHelper.GetColIndex(WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IHTMLTableCell)
member.summary: Get the column of the current cell zero based

member.summary: Zero based

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.HTMLEditHelper.GetColCount(WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IHTMLTable,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the column count of row(rowindex) Accounts for colSpan property

member.name: M:WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.HTMLEditHelper.DeleteRow(WebsitesScreenshot.SupportClasses.IHTMLTable,System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a given rowindex in a given table zero based If the table has no rows after deletion anymore we delete it compeletely
